globals_schema.formatted_aqi_report_T005:
Kolkata Air Quality Index (AQI) Report

Date: 2025-12-22

Executive Summary

This report assesses the Air Quality Index (AQI) for Kolkata on December 22, 2025. Due to a complete absence of available data from all monitored sources, a definitive AQI value could not be established. The details of this finding are elaborated below.

Data Availability

On December 22, 2025, no AQI data was accessible from any of the following sources:

  • aqi.in
  • aqicn.org
  • ews.tropmet.res.in
  • air-quality.com
  • iqair.com

The absence of data across multiple independent sources suggests a potential widespread issue in monitoring or reporting on the specified date.

AQI Value

AQI Value: Not Available (N/A)

Standardization Method

Given the lack of available data, no standardization or reconciliation of AQI values could be performed. The representative AQI value cannot be computed.

Data Limitations and Caveats

The primary limitation is the complete absence of AQI data from all identified sources. This prevents any meaningful analysis or reporting on the air quality in Kolkata on the specified date. Potential reasons for this data unavailability include:

  • Sensor malfunction or temporary suspension of monitoring activities.
  • Network connectivity issues preventing data transmission.
  • Database errors or scheduled maintenance affecting data access.

Conclusion

Due to the unavailability of AQI data from all tracked sources, a reliable air quality assessment for Kolkata on December 22, 2025, is not possible. Further investigation into the cause of the data outage is recommended to prevent similar occurrences in the future.

nodes.description: Research AQI data sources for Kolkata on 2025-12-22.
nodes.agent_prompt: Identify reliable sources of historical Air Quality Index (AQI) data for Kolkata, India on 2025-12-22. Prioritize official government sources or reputable environmental monitoring organizations. Consider APIs, databases, or websites that provide AQI information.

nodes.description: Extract AQI for Kolkata on 2025-12-22 from identified sources.
nodes.agent_prompt: Extract the Air Quality Index (AQI) value for Kolkata on 2025-12-22 from the identified data sources: `aqi_data_sources_T001`. If multiple sources are available, retrieve data from each to ensure data validation.

nodes.description: Standardize AQI data from multiple sources.
nodes.agent_prompt: Standardize the AQI data retrieved from various sources (`kolkata_aqi_raw_data_T002`). Resolve any discrepancies, reconcile units, and compute a single, representative AQI value for Kolkata on 2025-12-22. Provide justifications for any data cleaning or averaging performed.

nodes.description: Assess data reliability and flag inconsistencies.
nodes.agent_prompt: Assess the reliability of the standardized AQI data (`kolkata_aqi_standardized_T003`). Check for inconsistencies, missing values, or potential errors in the data. If the data is deemed unreliable, create a fallback plan to identify alternative sources or methods for determining the AQI.

nodes.description: Request clarification on ambiguous AQI result.
nodes.agent_prompt: The AQI data for Kolkata on 2025-12-22 is unreliable. Request clarification from the user on how to proceed. Should we search for alternative sources, estimate based on nearby dates, or indicate that data is unavailable?

nodes.description: Present the AQI value for Kolkata on 2025-12-22.
nodes.agent_prompt: Format the final, reliable AQI value for Kolkata on 2025-12-22 (`kolkata_aqi_standardized_T003`) into a human-readable format. Include the AQI value, the date, and the source of the data. If there are any caveats or limitations to the data, include those as well.

nodes.description: Research AQI data sources for Kolkata on 2025-12-22.
nodes.agent_prompt: Identify reliable sources of historical Air Quality Index (AQI) data for Kolkata, India on 2025-12-22. Prioritize official government sources or reputable environmental monitoring organizations. Consider APIs, databases, or websites that provide AQI information.

return {'aqi_data_sources_T001': urls}

issues.problem: The standardized AQI data is null due to the unavailability of source data. This requires a fallback plan to identify alternative sources.
issues.recommendation: The fallback plan should be executed immediately to find alternative sources or methods for AQI determination. The plan should outline specific steps, including searching for historical data, contacting local environmental agencies, or employing predictive models based on available meteorological data.
